weka.knowledgeflow.steps

Class ImageViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.knowledgeflow.steps.BaseStep
      • weka.knowledgeflow.steps.ImageViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, BaseStepExtender, DataCollector, Step

    @KFStep(name="ImageViewer",
        category="Visualization",
        toolTipText="View images",
        iconPath="weka/gui/knowledgeflow/icons/StripChart.gif")
public class ImageViewer
extends BaseStep
implements DataCollector
    A step for collecting and viewing image data
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Get a list of outgoing connections that can be generated given the current state of the step - will produce StepManager.CON_IMAGE data if we have at least one incoming image connection connection

      • retrieveData

        public java.lang.Object retrieveData()
